item.description:
Halloween is coming! What are you going to be this year? Join us as we have a fun night at the annual Boston SKi and Sports Club BeWicked Ball. Register early to be included in the VIP Cocktail Hour sponsored by Appleton Rum! ONLY your pre-purchased VIP ticket gives you access to:


* Hors d'oeuvres for VIP hour from 9:30-10:30PM
* Complimentary Appleton Rum Halloween cocktail
* VIP Line privileges
* $1,000 cash prize costume contest
* Boston’s top DJs will be spinning dance music until 2AM

Time: VIP Party 9:30-10:30, General Admission 10:00PM-2:00AM
Individual Price: $25
BSSC Member Price: $20 until 10/27, as of 10/28 price $25

How to Register
• Call BSSC at 617.789.4070 x245

Each member is responsible for their own ticket purchase. If you are pre-purchasing and getting the VIP ticket, we will meet inside the entrance at 9:30. If you come later, please look for Catherine or call 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside the entance. If need to, call 774 232 0000
item.name: BSSC BeWicked Halloween Ball
